title: Creamy Mushroom Soup
short_description: A hearty, creamy soup with a rich mushroom flavor, perfect for a moderate meal and ready in under 30 minutes.

steps.title: Sauté the Mushrooms
steps.description: Heat the olive oil over medium heat in a large pot. Add mushrooms and a pinch of salt, sauté for 7 minutes until they are golden and softened.

steps.title: Add Onions and Garlic
steps.description: Add the onions and garlic to the pot. Sauté with mushrooms until the onions become translucent, about 5 more minutes.

steps.title: Thicken Soup Base
steps.description: Sprinkle with flour and stir for 1 minute to cook off the raw flavor.

steps.title: Add Broth
steps.description: Gradually pour in the vegetable broth, stirring well to avoid lumps and cook for another 5 minutes.

steps.title: Simmer
steps.description: Let the soup simmer for another 5 minutes so that the flavors meld together.

steps.title: Final Touch
steps.description: Stir in the heavy cream and heat through. Season with salt and pepper according to taste. Serve hot garnished with chopped fresh parsley.
